contribution_desc:
Connichiwa is an iOS application that runs a webserver on a iOS device (e.g. iPad) to which arbitrary other devices can connect. Connichiwa allows to create web applications that span multiple devices. It abstracts devcie discovery and cross-device communication away, so developers don't have to implement these themselves.
Through Bluetooh it also enables auto discovery and rough distance estimation. 
Devices can be stitched together with a pinching gesture.
